Hi everyone! I was born and I grew up in Rome. Since one year I live and study Linguistics in the Netherlands.
I dicovered for the first time Free Software in 1997. Since 1999 I use Debian and lately I came closer and closer to Ubuntu Linux.
Since 2001 I'm member of the no-profit association called Liber Liber for which I've been coordinating the collaborative project known as LiberGNU.
